rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living space with Scandinavian minimalist design and large windows for natural light. Vastu-aligned with east-west orientation to ensure positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen; features a central dining table and minimalistic Scandinavian decor. Positioned in north-east direction to invite prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient, functional layout with modern appliances and open plan concept. Locally compliant building norms are followed for safety and ventilation. Vastu principles suggest placement in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed to face south or west to receive optimal sunlight while maintaining privacy. Incorporates Scandinavian simplicity and functional storage solutions.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom on the ground floor for convenience and safety. Vastu-compliant placement in the north-west area to encourage restful sleep.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A dedicated library space featuring built-in bookshelves and a quiet reading nook. Placed towards the west or north as per Vastu for concentration and creativity, with Scandinavian aesthetics using light wood and natural lighting.

openings.description: Large double doors that open directly into the living room. Designed to welcome energy and light in keeping with Vastu principles.
Large window in the living area maximizing natural light while maintaining privacy.
Window installed in guest bedroom to ensure proper air circulation and light.
Door leading to a small balcony for fresh air and outdoor views, in line with Scandinavian design.
